title: Pain, passion and profit
creator_credit: Gurinder Chadha, Gerard Rosenberg, BBC and International Broadcasting Trust
brief_description: Anita Roddick, founder and manager of Body Shop International visits Africa and looks at how women entrepreurs survive and flourish. In Kenya she investigates a successful women’s cooperative producing an efficient earthenware stove and in Ghana she looks at a food preservation business and a clothing industry, both managed by women.
